name: react-starter
description: A minimalist latest version react, react-router, redux and auth plus node static and api server skeleton, an exploration for personal use

scripts.build-js: mkdir -p public/js && browserify src/main.js -t babelify --outfile public/js/bundle.js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p public/css && node-sass --output-style compressed styles/main.scss public/css/main.css
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch-css' 'npm run watch-js' 'npm start'

author: Victor Kane
